sect1.title: About this chapter
sect1.para: This chapter provides an overview of the DarwinPorts Manager application and how to use it as an alternative to the command-line tools for DarwinPorts.

sect1.title: DarwinPorts Manager.app
sect1.para: DarwinPorts Manager.app is a Cocoa GUI for the DarwinPorts project. It will allow users to browse through available ports and their descriptions and to download, install, and uninstall the software. DarwinPorts Manager.app is currently under development, and is based on the older Ports Manager.app. There is a Port for the older Ports Manager.app, and will be in the future for DarwinPorts Manager.app, so you can use DarwinPorts to install it for you! sudo port install PortsManager. Ports Manager.app will be installed in your /Applications/Utilities folder. A screen shot is available of Ports Manager.app in action.
We will also be providing a binary installer (a '.pkg') file in the near future for DarwinPorts Manager.app.
